subject: Horses
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Russell Baze, the jockey with the most career victories in thoroughbred racing history, was suspended for 15 days and fined for using his whip on an injured horse who later died.
snippet: Russell Baze, the jockey with the most career victories in thoroughbred racing history, was suspended for 15 days and fined for using his whip on an injured horse who later died.
